translation: Sutra of the Venerable Great King of Illumination

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚少卿
translation: Tripiṭaka of the Western Translation of the Sutra of the Buddha, Tathāgata, and Young Secretary of the Court

source_sentence: 傳法大師臣施護奉　詔譯
translation: Translated by imperial decree by the Minister of the Transmission of the Dharma, Shihu
It was then that the Bhagavān addressed Ānanda and said.
"Ānanda, there's the venerable Great King of Illumination.

source_sentence: 乃是過去一切諸佛之所宣說。
translation: It was proclaimed by all the buddhas of the past.

source_sentence: 阿難彼七俱胝如來亦隨喜宣說。
translation: Ānanda, those seven koṭī tathāgatas also delighted in proclaiming it.

source_sentence: 我今復為未來世中一切眾生宣揚顯說。
translation: Now, I'll again proclaim and explain it for all sentient beings in future generations.
You must listen closely.

source_sentence: 阿難若有善男子善女人。
translation: Ānanda, suppose there are good men and good women who hear this venerable great insight and want to accept it.

source_sentence: 聞此尊勝大明欲受持讀誦者。
translation: hear about this venerable great teaching and want to memorize it, read it, and recite it, they must first purify their body and mind.
First, he must purify body and mind.

source_sentence: 歸命一切諸佛一切尊法一切聖眾。
translation: They must give their vows to all the buddhas, all the honored ones, and all the holy ones.

source_sentence: 又復歸命大悲觀自在菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: Also, he must give his vows to the greatly compassionate Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.

source_sentence: 亦復歸命擁護娑婆世界主。
translation: Also, he must give his vows to the lord who guards the sahā world.
...and to all the buddhas who guard the heavens.

source_sentence: 歸命如是諸佛菩薩及聖眾已。
translation: After he gives his vows to such buddhas, bodhisattvas, and noble congregations, then he can recite it.
Then he could recite them.
He then said, "Venerable Great King of Illumination!

source_sentence: 怛儞也(二合)他(引)馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉　地里地里地里地里地里地里地里　度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕　酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕　摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉　彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里　母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕　擁護於我及一切眾生　呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷　護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕　吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷　彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷　唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷　祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕　薩哩嚩(二合)部多鉢囉(二合)底史(引)鄧迦嚕彌　莎賀一切冤家發惡心者極毒害者。
translation: 怛儞也(二合)他(引)馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉馱囉　地里地里地里地里地里地里地里　度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕度嚕　酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕酥嚕　摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉摩囉　彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里彌里　母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕母嚕　擁護於我及一切眾生　呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷呬隷　護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕護嚕　吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷吉隷　彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷彌隷　唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷唧隷　祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕祖嚕　薩哩嚩(二合)部多鉢囉(二合)底史(引)鄧迦嚕彌　莎賀一切冤家發惡心者極毒害者。
If they want to do bad things to themselves and other sentient beings.

source_sentence: 作諸惡法使生諸病或欲障閉令眼不見令耳不聞。
translation: They want to do bad things that cause illness, or they want to block the eyes and prevent the ears from hearing.
Their nose doesn't smell good, and their mouth can't speak.

source_sentence: 乃至一切身分咸欲繫縛者。
translation: It's even the case that someone wants to bind up all identities.

source_sentence: 而彼冤家或自作或令他作。
translation: Those enemies either do it themselves or cause others to do it.

source_sentence: 乃至彼類隨喜之者悉皆破壞。
translation: They all destroy those who delight in them.

source_sentence: 覩嚕覩嚕覩嚕覩嚕莎賀
translation: Tulu Tuluṣa.

source_sentence: 一切魑魅魍魎吠多拏旋風鬼。
translation: "All the spirits, ghosts, monsters, and Vetāna whirlwind spirits.
All such spirits.
They want to arouse bad thoughts and act in a way that's not beneficial.
They scatter in all directions and leave far behind.

source_sentence: 左囉左囉莎賀摩囉摩囉莎賀彌里彌里莎賀度嚕度嚕莎賀一切人非人等發起惡心。
translation: Zoroṣaṭha, Mālmālāsahā, Mṛgāra, Mṛgāra, Tūru, Tūru, and Sālmāra, all humans and non-humans alike will arouse bad thoughts.
They restrain us and other sentient beings.
They cause them to go crazy or deluded.

source_sentence: 或已作或欲作皆悉解除。
translation: They're all released, whether they've done it or are about to do it.
Nirgrantha is like the Paranirmita-vaśavartin world.

source_sentence: 莎賀閉帝閉多計世莎賀路(引)呬帝(引)路呬多計世莎賀阿嚩捺(引)帝(引)阿嚩捺(引)多計世莎賀濕吠(二合)帝(引)濕吠(二合)多嚩娑怛囉(三合)馱囉尼(引)曳(引)莎賀王怖賊怖水火等怖。
translation: Śākya-vṛtti-vṛtti(citation needed), Śākya-lughti(citation needed), and Śākya-avṛtti(citation needed), Āvṛtti(citation needed), Āvṛtti(citation needed), and Āvṛtti(citation needed).
Nākinī fears Vaiśāsaka fears.

source_sentence: 供畔拏怖羯吒布單曩怖。
translation: Suppanā fears Kāṭapūtanā fears.

source_sentence: 影鬼怖諸如是等惡鬼神怖或在道路或在曠野。
translation: He's afraid of shadow ghosts, and he's afraid of all these bad spirits, whether they're on the road or in the wilderness.
They're all at ease when they walk around during the day and night.

source_sentence: 又復冤家見面除解聞語除解。
translation: "Furthermore, enemies are removed when they see each other and are freed when they hear words.
They rejoice when they see each other as relatives.

source_sentence: 怛儞也(二合)他(引)護嚕護嚕尼吉尼吉里尼吉里尼莎賀一切邪明截斷破壞。
translation: The tathāgata (verse) Hulu Hulu niji niji li niji li niji sahā cuts off and destroys all wrong mentalities.
They may burn themselves up like ashes.
They may harm themselves or become deluded.

source_sentence: 亂或釘橛崩倒或隱沒不現。
translation: They may be confused, pegged and collapsed, or hidden from view.
They may naturally fall back depending on the contrivance of emptiness.
Or they may have words that obstruct or prevent them.
The fiery demon king's realm is shaken and frightened.

source_sentence: 怛儞也(二合)他(引)娑吒娑吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒部嚕部嚕母嚕母嚕莎賀若魔若魔民以惡心相向。
translation: 怛儞也(二合)他(引)娑吒娑吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒[口*癹]吒部嚕部嚕母嚕母嚕莎賀若魔若魔民以惡心相向。

source_sentence: 或自在天或夜叉夜叉女等。
translation: It could be the Śivaites or the Yakṣas or the Yakṣas and women.
... even all those who eat blood.
Those who eat meat and those who eat fat and oil.
Those who eat semen and breath and those who eat saliva.

source_sentence: 諸如是等所執所縛悉皆解脫。
translation: All of these things that they hold and are bound to are freed.
It doesn't even matter if a man or woman is born in a womb or lays hold of a womb.
At the time of their first birth, they'll all attain peace.

source_sentence: 阿難此尊勝大明王是世間母。
translation: Ānanda, this venerable, great luminous king is the mother of the world.
All sentient beings are like his son.
Ānanda, suppose good sons and good women.
They hear such a venerable, great luminosity.
He can memorize it, read it, and recite it.

source_sentence: 是人無始已來所有罪業皆得除滅。
translation: That person's whole gamut of sins from beginningless time will be removed.
Everything that's auspicious about it will grow.
Those who see it rejoice when it's accomplished.
"Again, good sons and good women.
Take this bright king and put it on a piece of paper.
Either on your head or on your arm, you'll always carry it.
All bad fortune will be avoided.
In their sleep and dreams, there are no bad states.
Fire can't burn it, and water can't float it.
All bad things won't be harmed.
Perhaps he might scoop up water and recite this luminous king.
After chanting it, he inhales it into his nose.

source_sentence: 所有在身宿業亦得除滅。
translation: All the past karma that's present in his body is also removed.
It also increases his skillfulness and constantly attains well-being.

source_sentence: 一切邪明呪詛不饒益事。
translation: All incorrect incantations and curses won't benefit him.

source_sentence: 以此明王加持淨水或線或白芥子。
translation: Use this luminous king to bless pure water, thread, or white mustard seed.
He'll remove them naturally and retrogress.
Ānanda, I first told you.

source_sentence: 此大明王乃是過去七俱胝如來同共宣說。
translation: 'This great luminous king was jointly explained by seven co-tathāgatas in the past.'

source_sentence: 我今復為未來眾生無福無德。
translation: Now, I'll also tell you about future sentient beings who lack merit and virtue.

source_sentence: 有諸惡鬼種種惱亂不得安隱。
translation: They'll be afflicted by evil spirits and won't be able to rest easy.

source_sentence: 是故宣說汝善受持當使未來流傳不斷。
translation: Therefore, I declare that you should well accept and uphold it so that it will continue to spread in the future.
You will be a source of support for all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊說是尊勝大明王已。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān spoke of this honored victorious great king of illumination.

source_sentence: 尊者阿難歡喜信受禮佛而退。
translation: Venerable Ānanda joyfully and faithfully accepted it, saluted the Buddha, and withdrew.
The Buddha Explained the Venerable King of Great Luminosity Sutra
